commitment.object: end user’s service usage
end user’s personal data
identification of content author and hosting service for official inquiries
all tracking technologies, including cookies, session storage, fingerprints…
products and services usage
personal data
APIs and programmatic access to content
public behaviour
content depicting, encouraging or glorifying suicide, eating disorders, self-harm
content or behavior that threatens, incites violence against, dehumanizes an individual or a group on the basis of protected attributes such as race, ethnicity, gender, sexual orientation…
material that features or promotes the exploitation of minors (sexual, emotional…)
content threatening, inciting or facilitating offline violence
accounts for individuals or groups that engage in or promote offline violence or organized criminal activity
untargeted, irrelevant, obviously unwanted, unauthorized commercial or promotional content
behaviour aimed at artificially amplifying or suppressing content visibility (fake engagement, inauthentic behaviour…)
selling, buying, or facilitating transactions in illegal or regulated goods or services (drugs, medication, weapons…)
content containing or engaging others to use abusive language, doxxing, intimidation against an individual
content containing or inciting sharing people's private information or media without their permission
demonstrably false or misleading information which may lead to physical harm, electoral processes disruption or other systemic harms
consensually produced and distributed media containing adult genitalia or nipples
expressions of desire, requests for a romantic or sexual relationship
content containing copyrighted works
handling of information of a deceased individual
acceptable and unacceptable usage
restrictions on specific usage

commitment.audience: commercial partners, content creators in a platform
commitment.object: business or commercial usage
how copyright complaints (DMCA…) will be handled
account records access
human rights
in-app and other virtual goods purchase usage
review process of provided content
usage of the service provider’s brand
quality of content produced by means of the service

commitment.audience: data controllers (in the sense of GDPR)
commitment.object: end user personal data

commitment.audience: data controllers (in the sense of GDPR)
commitment.object: status of data processor (in the sense of GDPR) for the service provider

commitment.audience: data controllers (in the sense of GDPR)
commitment.object: user consent collection and storage
closed captioning on streamed content
protection of end users that act as sellers
connecting user account to other services
how to report a security vulnerability or issue
end user’s live service usage
acceptable and unacceptable usage
how generic complaints will be handled
benefits and limitations associated with the transportation being provided
warranty, delivery, return of goods or services bought through a monetary transaction
buying through a monetary transaction goods or services offered by sellers other than the marketplace itself
selling through a monetary transaction goods or services to buyers other than the marketplace itself

commitment.writer: search engine or intermediation service provider
commitment.audience: users presented with a list of ranked results, or contributors of results that are ranked
commitment.object: parameters determining ranking and the reasons for their relative importance
eligibility criteria, limitations and benefits of a privileged seller status programme

commitment.writer: search engine or intermediation service provider
commitment.object: complaints handling, mediation, transparency and other rights and information mandated by the P2B regulation
eligibility and process of mediation after internal complaints handling failed
personal data of business users and of people acting on their behalf
